description.0: An ancient longbow crested with red feathers, a sacred relic of the Flower-Feather Clan that has been passed down from generation to generation.

0.0: For 12s after triggering a Swirl reaction, ATK increases by <cryo>24%</cryo>. In addition, when 1/2 or more characters in the party are of a different Elemental Type from the equipping character, the DMG dealt by the equipping character's Charged Attacks is increased by <cryo>20%/48%</cryo> and Elemental Burst DMG dealt is increased by <cryo>10%/24%</cryo>.

1.0: For 12s after triggering a Swirl reaction, ATK increases by <cryo>30%</cryo>. In addition, when 1/2 or more characters in the party are of a different Elemental Type from the equipping character, the DMG dealt by the equipping character's Charged Attacks is increased by <cryo>25%/60%</cryo> and Elemental Burst DMG dealt is increased by <cryo>12.5%/30%</cryo>.

2.0: For 12s after triggering a Swirl reaction, ATK increases by <cryo>36%</cryo>. In addition, when 1/2 or more characters in the party are of a different Elemental Type from the equipping character, the DMG dealt by the equipping character's Charged Attacks is increased by <cryo>30%/72%</cryo> and Elemental Burst DMG dealt is increased by <cryo>15%/36%</cryo>.

3.0: For 12s after triggering a Swirl reaction, ATK increases by <cryo>42%</cryo>. In addition, when 1/2 or more characters in the party are of a different Elemental Type from the equipping character, the DMG dealt by the equipping character's Charged Attacks is increased by <cryo>35%/84%</cryo> and Elemental Burst DMG dealt is increased by <cryo>17.5%/42%</cryo>.

4.0: For 12s after triggering a Swirl reaction, ATK increases by <cryo>48%</cryo>. In addition, when 1/2 or more characters in the party are of a different Elemental Type from the equipping character, the DMG dealt by the equipping character's Charged Attacks is increased by <cryo>40%/96%</cryo> and Elemental Burst DMG dealt is increased by <cryo>20%/48%</cryo>.
